overview: I am a visionary, innovative, and multi-faceted executive leader and entrepreneur with 10+ years of broad experience driving IT development and corporate technology strategy for top Fortune 500 companies. I provide senior leadership driving global teams to deliver key initiatives in the areas of business process automation, data storage architecture, change management, and infrastructure optimization. I provide proven expertise turning around underperforming areas and leveraging technology to promote business efficiency. I have extensive experience in developing strategic alliances with vendors and channel partners. My business acumen is unparalleled; I have a keen ability to break down complex challenges and deliver creative technology solutions focused on operational excellence.
